description:
Like the speeder ships? Pick some up here at my Amazon affiliated link: https://amzn.to/2E3xkht

For more information on DM crafting visit my website:
http://www.thedmscraft.com/

Visit my affiliated link at the Hot Wire Foam Factory to pick up your own sculpting tool:
https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/K02B_Crafters_Basic_Sculpting_Tool_Kit.html?bid=14&partner=32240

Make sure to pick up the Sculpting Tool Tensioner so your tool will stay taut. Here is my affiliated link:
https://hotwirefoamfactory.com/-017-WT-Sculpting-Tool-Wire-Tensioner.html?bid=14&partner=32240

Scotty’s favorite glue gun (Amazon affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV

Matte Mod Podge (Amazon affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2HwOXIP

Metallic Chocolate acrylic craft paint (Amazon affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2tO5d66

Burnt Sienna acrylic craft paint (Amazon affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2DtjrZJ

Aqua acrylic craft paint (Amazon affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2FDuRQL

Get cheap crafting stuff at the Dollar Tree (My affiliated link): http://www.shareasale.com/u.cfm?d=434929&m=64888&u=1701826

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Corroded Alien World Scatter Terrain (DM’s Craft Short Tip #104)
